plans_onetime.text: You get: Builder lapel pin. Editorial reports. Swag giveaways. Tyee event discounts. Partner discounts. That warm fuzzy feeling that comes with doing something good.
You get: Everything in the previous level, and our reporter Katie Hyslop will make up a song with your name in it to entertain herself as she travels our vast province.
You get: Everything in the previous level, and an imaginary group hug with The Tyee's newsroom.
Everything in the previous level, plus a handwritten postcard from one of reporter Katie Hyslop’s stops on her B.C. odyssey.
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus FREE entry into a future Tyee Beyond the Headlines event (we’ll explain later).
You get: Everything in the previous level, plus a personal phone call from reporter Katie Hyslop.
You get: Everything in the previous level, and an invitation to an annual dinner with Tyee editors and reporters.
